title: Web Development
description: We create stunning, responsive websites using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.js. Our development process includes UI/UX design, frontend development, backend APIs, and database integration.
features: Fast loading times and SEO optimization
pricing: Starting from $2,500 for basic websites, $5,000+ for e-commerce sites

title: Mobile App Development
description: Native and cross-platform mobile app development for iOS and Android. We build apps that provide excellent user experience and performance across all devices.
pricing: Starting from $8,000 for basic apps, $15,000+ for complex applications

title: Digital Marketing
description: Comprehensive digital marketing services including SEO, social media marketing, PPC advertising, and content marketing to help your business grow online.
pricing: Starting from $1,500/month for basic packages, $3,000+/month for comprehensive campaigns

title: Branding & Design
description: Complete branding solutions including logo design, brand identity, marketing materials, and visual design that represents your business professionally.
pricing: Starting from $1,000 for logo design, $3,000+ for complete brand packages

title: E-commerce Solutions
description: Full-featured e-commerce websites with payment processing, inventory management, order tracking, and customer management systems.
pricing: Starting from $5,000 for basic stores, $10,000+ for advanced e-commerce platforms
